name: I Failed Wizard School and Now I Only Have a Magic Missile
name_original: I Failed Wizard School and Now I Only Have a Magic Missile
description:
Made for the Summer 2020 My First Game Jam.

This actually is my first game, so enjoy! This game is a short experience, and can be completed in under 10 minutes.

Controls:

WASD to move

Left click to fire, aim with mouse
Use the number keys to toggle spellmods:

  1. Split
  2.  Heavy

Credits

  • Alison Cremeans - Programming and Game Design
  • Cameron Stoddard - Music
  • Summer Cremeans - Art and Animation
